abece.a: a0 abece “alphabet” < a combination of the name of the first three letters in Turkish alphabet; s0 a “alpha”, a0 be “beta” and a0 ce “gamma”.

kavra-.a:
a0 kavra- “yellow” ≈ a3 sarı < a2 صاری ≈ c1 шурӑ < p1 *sarïg “yellow, white” < p1 *sarï- “to become yellowish white” + a1 *-g

Besides, p1 *sarïg > p2 *siro “white”, p3 *sïra “yellow”

Besides, a1 *sarï- < a1 *saŕ “egg membrane” a1 *+ï-

See sarmak.

sarı.a:
a0 sarı “yellow” ≈ a3 sarı < a2 صاری ≈ c1 шурӑ < p1 *sarïg “yellow, white” < p1 *sarï- “to become yellowish white” + a1 *-gak

Besides, p1 *sarïg > p2 *siro “white”, p3 *sïra “yellow”

Besides, a1 *sarï- < a1 *saŕ “egg membrane” a1 *+ï-

See sarmak.
